Package com.bytedesk.service.routing_strategy

Class AgentThreadRoutingStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.service.routing_strategy.AbstractThreadRoutingStrategy
com.bytedesk.service.routing_strategy.AgentThreadRoutingStrategy
@Component("agentThreadStrategy") public class AgentThreadRoutingStrategy extends AbstractThreadRoutingStrategy
客服线程路由策略 负责处理一对一人工客服的线程创建和路由逻辑
Author:
jackning 270580156@qq.com
